bitfield.description: Receiver high speed clock active: Driven active when the receiver high speed clock is active.
Common ready indication: Indicates the completion of the startup process of the common module.
Disable power shut off: Disables the ability to switch off the analog switched power islands in the
Disable power shut off: Power Shutoff signal for CMN
PMA state machine clock frequency divider control: This signal specifies a divider value used to create an internal divided clock that is a function of the psm_clock clock.
